SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers

Class RoomController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.GuiController
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.view.gui.controllers.RoomController
public class RoomController extends GuiController
Controller class for the room GUI screen. Handles user interactions within a game room, such as selecting a totem color, leaving the room, and updating room state.

    • leaveRoom

      private void leaveRoom()
      Leaves the current room and changes the scene to the main menu. If an error occurs, shows an error popup with the appropriate message.

    • setColor

      private void setColor()
      Sets the totem color for the player and updates the room state. If an error occurs, shows an error popup with the appropriate message.

      Updates the players count label in the room.
